item.description:
RELEASE INFO: * Tweak collection mods column widths * Fix mods sometimes not being enabled in collection mods area
CHANGES FROM v1.14: * Updated dependencies * Fix segfault CTD on certain Linux (openSUSE) configurations * Update for Stellaris 3.0
